settings.title: Micropearl™ Memory foam
settings.content: The soft, washable cover consists of hundreds of comfort pockets that encourage air flow for cool comfort.

settings.title: Superfine Wellsleep fibres
settings.content: Soft as down, light as a feather, the superfine Wellsleep fibres provide circulation and a soft, cradling feel.

settings.title: The Octaspring® layer
settings.content: Our Octaspring® technology combines the comfort of foam with the support of springs.

settings.bonus-gift-content: What goes into the Octasmart® Pillow?

settings.listtitle: Watch our light bulb test to discover how the Octasmart® Pillow provides optimum neck and head support.

settings.title: Octaspring® Aerospace Technology
settings.content: Combining the support of springs with the comfort of foam, our award-winning Octaspring®️ technology, originally used in aircraft seating, was repurposed by our sleep experts to create the perfect surface for you to fall asleep faster, deeper and for longer.

settings.title: 8x More Breathable
settings.content:
The Octaspring® structure is not only 8x more breathable than most standard foam, it also creates its own micro-climate to regulate your temperature for cool, dry comfort all night long.

Inside the Octasprings is an Octavent™ air system which works to expel hot air and draw fresh cool air back in, reducing your body’s temperature by 3 degrees.

settings.title: Relief from aches and pains
settings.content: he Octasmart® Pillow uses SMARTcomfort engineering to alleviate pressure on your neck and shoulders. Combining this with a layer of Octaspring® technology, we've created a pillow with incredible support and comfort that intelligently responds to your body.

settings.title: Fresher sleep
settings.content: The Octasmart® Pillow is wrapped in a Smart Performance cover which contains hypo-allergenic properties to provide you with a fresh, healthier sleeping environment. It's machine washable and made of ultra-soft material for that extra snuggly comfort!

settings.heading: Is the pillow washable?
settings.row_content: Thanks to the naturally enhanced airflow of the cover and its interior open-air cell structure, your pillow will stay fresher for longer, saving you the trouble of having to wash it on a regular basis. But you can remove the cover and machine wash it at 30 degrees.

settings.heading: Is the pillow hypo-allergenic?
settings.row_content: The naturally ultra-breathable cover is infused with hypo-allergenic technology, improving air circulation whilst it wicks away moisture and adds a little touch of sleep luxury.

settings.heading: Why is keeping cool so important for a good night's sleep?
settings.row_content: Your body temperature naturally falls in the evening, signalling that it's time for bed. A lower temperature also tells your body to produce melatonin, the sleep hormone. There's no doubt that you get better sleep when you're cool and comfortable (not hot and sweaty). The American Sleep Foundation has even recognised temperature as the #1 disrupter of sleep.

settings.heading: Why does my pillow seem thin after unpacking?
settings.row_content: The pillow might seem flimsy when you first unpack it because it's made of memory foam, which is compressed for shipping and storage. When you first unpack your Every Comfort Pillow, it will begin expanding immediately. Within a few hours, you'll notice a significant increase in size as the memory foam starts taking its intended shape. However, it's important to be patient because it may take up to 24-48 hours for the pillow to fully decompress and reach its maximum thickness.
